issue.title: Arrows of `AxisVisual` are never removed from scene

content.raw:
integrated [fix](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/dfff500) - test now passes for me.

I think the idea at that time was to remove only visualizations of sensor and physics data in order to fix an issue of dangling visual shared ptrs. I agree that there should be a better way to remove all child visuals. I worked on a generic way to cleanup visuals in the `visual_refactor` branch some time ago but just need time to finish it.
